td.content: inflamed swollen vocal cards, grade-2 esophagitis

observation.value: inflamed swollen vocal cards, grade-2 esophagitis

td.content: s:patient presents with 16 months history of mild heart burn, mild burning pain in the middle of the chest that usually occurs after eating or when lying down, Stomach. pt reports mild nausea. pt is a white male rubbish collector aged 31 years. he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 69 in, Weight 202 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15, endoscopy inflamed swollen vocal cards, grade-2 esophagitis, Mouth= Enamel erosions a:GERD p:performed endoscopy, and performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Lansoprazole - 30 mg po qd x 8 week.

td.content: s:a 32 YO male rubbish collector presents with mild nausea, mild heart burn x 7 weeks. pt also reports chronic mild burning pain in the middle of the chest that usually occurs after eating or when lying down. he denies ever using cigarettes Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol o:Height 70 in, Weight 204 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16, Chest = normal vesicular breathing, no crackles or wheezes a:GERD p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Nizatidine - 150 mg po bid x 4 weeks, and ordered CBC.
